A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There is character development everywhere. Seen it twice now just cause I needed to process. There is a good amount of lore that fans of the extended universe will like. I think one reason why people don’t like it is because It’s not spoon feed to them. This is a heavy movie. Lots going on. This makes me excited for the last installment. If you go into it w/o all the fan theories you’ll be better off and be able to enjoy it more. Planning on seeing it again tonight! #lukeisBAsoshutit!
